channel.title: Posts on Ashutosh Singh
channel.description: Recent content in Posts on Ashutosh Singh

item.title: configuring blogs
item.description: From your baseof.html file, it seems like the footer is included twice: ... <div class="max-w:700 w:full box:content-box"> {{- block "main" . }}{{- end }} {{- partial "footer.html" . -}} </div> ... {{ partial "footer.html" . }} ... You should probably only include the footer once, so you should remove one of the {{ partial "footer.html" . }} lines. Since the second footer is outside of the main <div>, I suggest you remove the first {{ partial "footer.
